greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) = Sum_{j=k..n} A077028(j,k), read by rows.
comment: Antidiagonal reading of A139600 without its left column. -_ R. J. Mathar_, Apr 17 2011
formula: A000012 * A077028 as infinite lower triangular matrices.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
maple: A077028 := proc(n,k) if n < 0 or k<0 or k > n then 0; else k*(n-k)+1 ; end if; end proc:
A134394 := proc(n,k) add ( A077028(j,k),j=k..n) ; end proc:
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 23 2007
